data.name: Vibrant
data.detailed_description:
Hotline Miami meets abstraction. Vibrant brings you "in the zone" through hyper-focus. Your last freedom is movement.
With Vibrant you'll meet the cold, efficient, scary, faster version of yourself.
Will you like it?

The experience is set to be as intense as possible.

Game Features:

  • Explore 31 hand crafted levels under extreme time-attack
  • Master the art of 2D combat with inertia
  • Lasso.
  • Each game 30 minutes top
  • 4 Different Endings: but you aren't probably worthy of them
  • Break rules, improve your timings
  • Guaranteed trance-like experience

Notes from the developer


Vibrant started its life back in 2002 as a short MS-DOS program. Curiously still alive 15 years later, it has turned into a quirky savage arena shooter I'm still learning from.

The goal was to make Vibrant as hypnotic as possible. I think it specifically trains short-term memory, as the number of things to remember in combat may well exceed your capacity for recent events.

If you feel overwhelmed, try to ask yourself the question "Can I focus more?". You probably can.

data.short_description: Hotline Miami meets abstraction. Vibrant brings you "in the zone" through hyper-focus. Your last freedom is movement.
data.reviews:
“When I do have a good ship built up, and I’ve made it through several levels by the skin of my teeth, I can get worked up enough to break a sweat.”
Paul Villapiano (TIGSource)

“As soon as you race elegantly through the arena you will notice that it’s a blast to play.”
Simon Kaizen (Pixel Prospector)

“Vibrant is a short game that can be enjoyed repetitively. It has the ability to sink its teeth into you and keep you coming back for more.”
4/5 – IGR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2.0+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2.0+

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2.0+
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2.0+
